name: The Owners
description: A group of friends think they've found an easy score at an empty house with a safe full of cash, but when the elderly owners arrive home things begin to go awry.

review.author: juicesone
review.heading: Not bad after a couple bong loads
review.reviewBody: I just stumbled into this movie and thought I'd give it a chance and so far it's okay and after smoking a bit it definitely made it more entertaining lol the main villain in this movie definitely gives a pretty good performance and also the old man so smoke a bowl and press play

keywords: burglary,robbery gone awry,breaking and entering,attempted robbery,home invasion
